Reviews.Title: Good Camera, Bad Wifi
Reviews.Author: Lesa Black
Reviews.Content: I'm really bummed the wifi didn't work well. Sony needs to improve the ability to connect to other networks beside the original one programmed. :-(

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Barbara J. Wiese
Reviews.Content: Good value for the price.  Takes wonderful pictures, fits in a pocket.  Easy to use.  Exactly what I was looking for in a small package.

Reviews.Title: The best for you, if you enjoy pictures!
Reviews.Author: Marlene
Reviews.Content: Excelent cammera and accesories, all in one buy! Just what I was looking for.I recommend this to all my friends.

Reviews.Title: I bought it for the lens but love it for its brains
Reviews.Author: PatInSanMiguel
Reviews.Content: It is so small yet has a 20x zoom.  And it has a lot of modes that I haven't figured out yet. It takes fantastic photos in it's automatic mode.  Last night we were on a sunset cruise and I chose it's "twilight mode". A quick snap and a bit of a wait for processing and voila, a great (but not quite accurate) shot of the sky.  Similarly shots of the town of Rovinj (in Croatia).

Reviews.Title: as advertised, no problems
Reviews.Author: Mike "Mike"
Reviews.Content: Genuine article, lots of accessories, quick delivery. Nice to finally have a camera that uses the same charging method as all my other gadgets (micro usb).

Reviews.Title: Great pictures...
Reviews.Author: muscles
Reviews.Content: It's a great camera and the kit comes with a lot of usefully items.... It probably should receive five stars though I don't give five stars to often....

Reviews.Title: Recommend in a heartbeat!
Reviews.Author: N.D. Montgomery
Reviews.Content: The huge bundle of stuff was a pleasant surprise, and just like the camera, I'm still learning how to use it all!The camera itself is great!  The only negative side I have found thus far is the processing time between shots!  It seems to take forever.  I travel constantly and have gotten good at taking photos while moving in a vehicle or on a train, so processing time can mean missing good shots.  I'm still learning with this camera though, and might find a way to change that!  Otherwise, it seems to be a really great camera with beautiful resulting photos!  pocket size, pretty light weight, large LCD screen and seemingly easy controls and menu choices.  What's not to like????

Reviews.Title: Glad we got the bundle.
Reviews.Author: Bill
Reviews.Content: The mini tripod didn't look like much but was the first accessory we reached for - very useful.  Great bundle, great camera.

Reviews.Title: So far so good...
Reviews.Author: Jovy M Elizarde
Reviews.Content: Just started fiddling with the camera & so far it's a decent, compact digital camera. Only had the chance to take picks @ night w/ low light & I must say it takes nice pics even w/o using the editing capabilities of the camera. I've yet to explore all it has to offer, including the video, but I must say I'm pleased thus far. This camera was purchased as part of a bundle w/  extra batteries, 16gb sd card, etc...

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Christine "Christine"
Reviews.Content: Easy to use once you take the time to read the Manuel on how to yes all of the features.

Reviews.Title: Quit working within one week
Reviews.Author: mick van blokland
Reviews.Content: The camera worked fine around our home but when we took it on a trip it stopped working.  We could not see anything in the display so we did not know what our picture would look like.  The pictures were poor quality and had dark edges.  The camera finally quit working and told us to turn off and turn it back on. It still did not work and that same message continued to appear.  We are going to try to return it.  It came through another vendor besides Amazon so we are not sure how this will go.  There was no paperwork with the camera when we received it.
